shorttext.p: At Cannes, the guys party it up and attend to the business of selling Medellin, and find themselves with two offers on the table before it's even screened, and in the end, the film is bought from an unlikely source, at a price much lower than they were hoping for.

Aunt Lou reunites with her son, Odell, who brings a business proposal to his mother's employer. Trixie confronts Alma regarding her returning drug habit and Ellsworth moving out of their home, as Leon informs Tolliver of the situation regarding Alma. An ailing Jane moves in with Joanie.

The children of Salzburg are playing in the snow. Pumperl joins in the fun and jumps on some ice in the river yet starts to float away. Can the children save the dog? And what has this got to do with the big telescope?

Scrooge buys one of Glomgold's islands housing a diamond mine. Upon finding out, Glomgold has the diamond mine blown away from the island. Scrooge, Launchpad, and the nephews then go back in time to try to prevent the explosion, but end up going back 1 million years.

Om is a junior artist in the 1970s. Shanti is the reigning superstar. He is her biggest fan. He is in love with her. Om dreams of being a superstar, but an incident changes his life forever. Om dies in a mishap, but is reborn into the present day, where he attempts to discover the mystery of his demise.

Meghan and Diana discover a way to extract the future entity out of Tom, which could cost him his life. Meanwhile, Shawn recruits a small band of Promicin positives to bust Kevin out of Promise City. And Isabelle delivers Jordan Collier into the hands of The Marked.

McNulty begins getting extreme amounts of unwanted attention towards his serial killer case. Because he knows this plot is one big facade, he allocates the extra man power to get other detectives real police work done, acting almost as Santa Claus: giving the detectives what they need.

As an experiment that will recreate the first moments of the origins of the universe, the Big Bang, goes terribly awry, the town's geniuses turn into morons, leaving the fate of Eureka in the hands of Jack Carter and an antisocial young ubergenius, Zane Donovan.

At Cannes, the guys party it up and attend to the business of selling Medellin, and find themselves with two offers on the table before it's even screened, and in the end, the film is bought from an unlikely source, at a price much lower than they were hoping for.

This is the story of three gentle persons: Paul Rivers an ailing mathematician lovelessly married to an English emigree, Christina Peck, an upper-middle-class suburban housewife, happily married and mother of two little girls, and Jack Jordan, an ex-convict who has found in his Christian faith the strength to raise a family.
A band of baby bandits in the desert steal the time crystals. Meanwhile, the Smurfs end up trapped in Gargamel's lair, after trying to hide a magic egg that grants every Smurf their fondest wish.

In response to Ryan's warning, Jim hits the links with Andy and Kevin to attempt to land his biggest client ever. Michael, Pam, Oscar, and Darryl set up a booth at a job fair at Pam's old high school to find applicants for Dunder Mifflin's summer internship, but Michael's shenanigans produce failure.

On the Planet Tides, Baltor's invasion has reached a critical phase when Baltor manipulates the gate to the Omega dimension into using its negative energy to cancel the positive of the Realm of Tides and destroying the existence of both areas.

Om is a junior artist in the 1970s. Shanti is the reigning superstar. He is her biggest fan. He is in love with her. Om dreams of being a superstar, but an incident changes his life forever. Om dies in a mishap, but is reborn into the present day, where he attempts to discover the mystery of his demise.

Meghan and Diana discover a way to extract the future entity out of Tom, which could cost him his life. Meanwhile, Shawn recruits a small band of Promicin positives to bust Kevin out of Promise City. And Isabelle delivers Jordan Collier into the hands of The Marked.

Lester Burnham, a man in his mid-40s going through an intense midlife crisis, has grown cynical and is convinced that he has no reason to go on. After developing an infatuation for his daughter's attractive friend, he decides to turn his hectic life around.

This is the story of three gentle persons: Paul Rivers an ailing mathematician lovelessly married to an English emigree, Christina Peck, an upper-middle-class suburban housewife, happily married and mother of two little girls, and Jack Jordan, an ex-convict who has found in his Christian faith the strength to raise a family.

The episode opens with two men chasing each other on the causeway. When the road collapses one man is thrown into a sinkhole and killed. While investigating, the CSIs discover a conspiracy to rob a bank.

Servilia mourns the death of Brutus, killed at Phillipi. She kneels in front of Atia's door chanting repeatedly for justice. Although Atia ignores her initially, the incessant chanting attracts a crowd of pleb onlookers and annoys Atia.

Jeffrey 'The Dude' Lebowski is the ultimate LA slacker, until one day his house is broken into and his rug is peed on by two angry gangsters who have mistaken him for Jeffrey Lebowski, the Los Angeles millionaire, whose wife owes some bad people some big money.

As the police force attempts to reign in the increasingly powerful Irish mafia, authorities are faced with the prospect of sending in an undercover agent or seeing their already frail grip on the criminal underworld slip even further.

Tony hits an unlucky stretch with a series of gambling losses, creating difficulties between him and Hesh. A.J. makes a life-changing decision regarding his relationship with Blanca, who makes an important decision of her own. And Vito's widow Marie turns to Tony for help with her troubled son.

Lester Burnham, a man in his mid-40s going through an intense midlife crisis, has grown cynical and is convinced that he has no reason to go on. After developing an infatuation for his daughter's attractive friend, he decides to turn his hectic life around.

The episode opens with two men chasing each other on the causeway. When the road collapses one man is thrown into a sinkhole and killed. While investigating, the CSIs discover a conspiracy to rob a bank.

Servilia mourns the death of Brutus, killed at Phillipi. She kneels in front of Atia's door chanting repeatedly for justice. Although Atia ignores her initially, the incessant chanting attracts a crowd of pleb onlookers and annoys Atia.
